Latest News

Oct 13, 2015

Issue 23 of LaTeX2e news released

Issue 23 of LaTeX2e news released. Beginning of October a new LaTeX maintenance relase was published and should by now be available for update.

 Aug 12, 2015

Talks from the 2015 and 2014 TUG conferences

Video presentations together with some slide show material from the TUG conferences 2014 in Boston and 2015 in Darmstadt. Talks on LaTeX.

 Feb 23, 2015

Papers on "Float Placement" and "Regression Tests"

Two new articles have been uploaded: a paper describing the mysteries of LaTeX's float placement algorithm and a paper about the new regression test.
